cafeMenu.name: Cowboy Burger
cafeMenu.description: A juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, bacon, and our special rodeo sauce.

cafeMenu.name: Sarsaparilla
cafeMenu.description: Traditional wild west brewed sarsaparilla soda.

cafeMenu.name: Chuck Wagon Chili
cafeMenu.description: Hearty beef and bean chili served with a side of cornbread.

cafeMenu.name: Frontier Fries
cafeMenu.description: Crispy seasoned fries served with a trio of dipping sauces.

cafeMenu.name: Prairie Pie
cafeMenu.description: Homemade apple pie made with fresh apples and a flaky crust.

cafeMenu.name: Mustang Mocha
cafeMenu.description: Rich chocolate mocha with a hint of cinnamon.

cafeMenu.name: Pioneer Punch
cafeMenu.description: Refreshing fruit punch made with fresh oranges, pineapples, and mangoes.

cafeMenu.name: Gold Rush Ginger Beer
cafeMenu.description: Spicy ginger beer that's brewed in-house.
